post:
We here at AcclaimedHost have been working hard the last few weeks after posting our initial LowEndTalk offer. We got some very good feedback from our clients, and we're now ready to expand our offerings.

We've hired new technical support engineers and are proud to now offer a 99.9% uptime guarantee on our VPS, instant activation, and a clean IP address.

To get the free upgrades provided, please simply post in the thread with your order ID and we'll take care of the upgrade for you. 

**U-256**

256 MB Guaranteed RAM

Equal Share CPU

30 GB RAID-10 Disk Space

500 GB Bandwidth

1 IPv4 Address

[$14.95/](https://clients.acclaimedhost.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=27)**year**

Promo code: MAYLOWEND1

**U-512**

512 MB Guaranteed RAM

Equal Share CPU

50 GB RAID-10 Disk Space

1 TB Bandwidth

1 IPv4 Address

[$4.29/month](https://clients.acclaimedhost.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=28)

Promo code: MAYLOWEND2

**U-1024 (now with 1536 MB RAM!)**

1024 MB Guaranteed Ram - now upgraded to 1536 MB Guaranteed RAM

Equal Share CPU

80 GB RAID-10 Disk Space

10 TB Bandwidth

2 IPv4 Addresses

[$7.00/month ](https://clients.acclaimedhost.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=29)

Promo code: MAYLOWEND3

Addons:
Extra IP address: $1/mo
Extra 1 GB RAM: $4/mo
Extra 100 GB disk space: $10/mo
Extra 3 TB bandwidth: $5/mo
